item.title: 路透社称马里军政府逮捕四名巴里克黄金公司员工
item.description: 据路透社周五报道，军方领导的马里当局逮捕了加拿大矿业公司巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：The military-led authorities in Mali have arrested four employees of Canadian mining company Barrick Gold Corp., Reuters reported Friday, citing two people it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 交易员忽视更深层次的问题，中国股市欣喜若狂
item.description: 中国股市的牛市已经被烧毁过很多次，但目前的这波亢奋是如此强烈，以至于他们把谨慎抛到了九霄云外。【原文：Chinese stock bulls have been burnt many times before but the current wave of euphoria is so strong that they’re throwing caution to the wind.】

item.title: 巴西法院裁定马斯克必须支付 190 万美元才能解除对 X 的禁令
item.description: 根据巴西最高法院周五提交的一份文件，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将不得不额外支付 1030 万雷亚尔（约合 190 万美元），以恢复社交媒体平台 X 在巴西的业务。【原文：Elon Musk will have to pay an additional 10.3 million reais ($1.9 million) to reinstate social media platform X in Brazil, according to a Supreme Court filing Friday.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特的美国银行抛售狂潮接近关键里程碑
item.description: 经过十几轮抛售，沃伦-巴菲特在美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：A dozen rounds of selling have trimmed Warren Buffett’s stake in Bank of America Corp. to the cusp of a key regulatory threshold, in which he will no longer need to quickly notify the public of his trading.】

item.title: 前墨西哥城官员接替约里奥出任财政部部长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的政府官员透露，一名前墨西哥城官员准备接替财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）。【原文：A former Mexico City official is poised to replace Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio, according to government officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局准备为受困的波音宇航员执行救援任务
item.description: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）准备向国际空间站发射一个双人乘员组，这是美国国家航空航天局（NASA）两名宇航员乘坐波音公司的 "星际客机"（Starliner）飞船返回太空站任务的开始。【原文：SpaceX is poised to launch a two-person crew to the International Space Station, the start of a mission to bring home two NASA astronauts stuck in orbit after flying on Boeing Co.’s Starliner spacecraft.】

item.title: 谷歌为广告技术安全辩护，称可与 Meta、亚马逊匹敌
item.description: 谷歌公司本周在联邦法院反驳司法部对其非法垄断的指控，称谷歌的技术为广告商和出版商提供了一个安全的生态系统，使他们能在竞争激烈的网络广告世界中利用各种工具进行交易。【原文：Google’s technologies offer advertisers and publishers a safe ecosystem of tools to transact amid the intensely competitive world of online advertising, the company argued in federal court this week to counter Justice Department allegations that it is an illegal monopoly.】

item.title: 波音法官下令就受害者家属反对的认罪协议举行听证会
item.description: 得克萨斯州的一名联邦法官下令在 10 月份举行听证会，让美国司法部为其与波音公司就两起致命的 737 Max 飞机坠毁事件达成的刑事认罪协议进行辩护；这一协议遭到了遇难者家属的反对。【原文：A federal judge in Texas ordered a hearing in October for the US Department of Justice to defend its criminal plea agreement with Boeing Co. over two fatal 737 Max plan crashes — a deal opposed by families of the victims.】

item.title: Binance 创始人 CZ 从美国监管机构获释
item.description: Binance 创始人赵长鹏因允许网络犯罪分子和恐怖组织在全球最大的加密货币交易所自由交易的失误而被联邦拘留，周五从加利福尼亚州的一家惩教机构获释。【原文：Binance founder Changpeng Zhao was released from a correctional facility in California on Friday after being held in federal custody for failures that allowed cybercriminals and terrorist groups to freely trade on the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange.】

item.title: 战争造成经济损失，以色列评级再次被穆迪下调
item.description: 穆迪评级公司今年第二次下调了以色列的评级，因为加沙近 12 个月的战事以及与真主党不断升级的冲突造成的经济损失越来越大。【原文：Israel was downgraded for the second time this year by Moody’s Ratings as the economic costs mount from almost 12 months of fighting in Gaza and an escalating conflict with Hezbollah.】

item.title: 激进派 Jana Partners 增持软件供应商 Rapid7 股份
item.description: Jana Partners 增持了 Rapid7 公司的股份，继续推动这家网络安全软件供应商寻求出售。【原文：Jana Partners has increased its stake in Rapid7 Inc. as it continues to push the cybersecurity software provider to pursue a sale.】

item.title: 全球政策放松后，华尔街的风险狂欢甚至扩展到了不受欢迎的资产上
item.description: 全年肆虐、价值数万亿美元的风险资产热潮正在吞噬越来越多的华尔街，而这一次，全球政策制定者也开始给予支持。【原文：The multitrillion-dollar boom in risky assets that’s raged all year is engulfing more and more of Wall Street — and this time global policy makers are starting to lend their support.】

item.title: 马斯克为火箭发射放弃会议后同意与美国证券交易委员会会面
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的律师向旧金山的一名法官保证，这位多情的亿万富翁将在下周接受证券监管机构的质询，调查他在 2022 年收购推特公司（Twitter Inc.【原文：Elon Musk’s lawyers assured a judge in San Francisco that the mercurial billionaire will show up next week to be questioned by securities regulators investigating his 2022 acquisition of Twitter Inc., after Musk ditched an earlier meeting to attend a rocket launch.】

item.title: 货币经理人对黄金的看涨押注跃升至四年新高
item.description: 在美联储自2020年以来首次降息后，贵金属连续创下新高，资金经理们对黄金的看涨押注也跃升至四年多来的最高点。【原文：Money managers’ bullish wagers on gold jumped to the highest in more than four years as the precious metal registered successive highs after Federal Reserve’s first interest-rate cut since 2020.】

item.title: 育碧需要下一部《刺客信条》大受欢迎
item.description:
本周，这家法国游戏公司的股价跌至2013年12月以来的最低水平

。【原文：

This week the French gaming company’s shares fell to their lowest level since December 2013

】

item.title: T-Mobile 上月推迟交易重返债券市场
item.description: T-Mobile US Inc. 将出售 5 亿美元的资产支持证券，这些证券由该公司向客户提供的手机分期付款计划提供支持，此前该交易于 8 月份被推迟。【原文：T-Mobile US Inc. is selling $500 million in asset backed securities supported by installment plans the company offers to customers to buy cell phones, after the deal was postponed in August.】

item.title: 芒果市场是最新一个与美国证券交易委员会达成和解的加密货币项目
item.description: 经营陷入困境的分散式融资项目 Mango Markets 的实体就美国证券交易委员会对其销售未注册证券和充当经纪人的指控达成和解。【原文：The entities operating the troubled decentralized finance project Mango Markets settled US Securities and Exchange Commission charges of selling unregistered securities and acting as an broker.】

item.title: Petrofac 债权人同意将大部分债务转为股权
item.description: Petrofac Ltd 周五发表声明称，已与一些主要利益相关者达成初步协议，债权人将把该公司的大部分债务转换为股权，从而大幅稀释现有股东的权益。【原文：Petrofac Ltd has reached a preliminary agreement with some of its key stakeholders that will see creditors convert a majority of the firm’s debt into equity, significantly diluting existing shareholders, according to a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 墨西哥重要财政官员将在过渡时期离职
item.description: 墨西哥财政部排名第二、任职时间最长的高级官员即将离任，这在总统换届期间是一个令人惊讶的发展，因为官员们一直在向投资者强调连续性。【原文：The second-highest-ranking and longest-tenured top official at Mexico’s finance ministry is set to leave his post, a surprise development amid a presidential transition where officials have been emphasizing continuity to investors.】

item.title: 关于《圣经》投资的存在性问题
item.description:
说到基于原则的投资，至少有两派观点

。【原文：

There’s at least two schools of thought when it comes to principles-based investing

】

item.title: Clearlake 支持的 Springs Window 寻求联合相互竞争的债务集团
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Clearlake Capital Group—backed Springs Window Fashions LLC 正在与两个债权人集团商讨债务重组协议，以便让最近对立的两派都加入进来。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group—backed Springs Window Fashions LLC is huddling with two creditor groups in search of a debt restructuring deal that would bring both recently-dueling factions on board, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 制糖巨头科森因杠杆问题考虑出售淡水河谷股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，亿万富翁鲁本斯-奥梅托（Rubens Ometto）的企业集团 Cosan SA 正在酝酿出售资产，其中包括其持有的矿业巨头淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）价值 22 亿美元的股份，这可能会解除为偿还债务而进行的一场变质的赌注。【原文：Billionaire Rubens Ometto’s conglomerate Cosan SA is mulling a sale of assets including its $2.2 billion stake in mining giant Vale SA, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially unwinding a soured bet to pay down debt.】

item.title: 农作物贸易商奥兰公司因延迟提交棉花销售报告被罚款 330 万美元
item.description: 农作物贸易商奥兰集团有限公司（Olam Group Ltd.）将因延迟向美国农业部和商品期货交易委员会报告棉花销售情况而支付 330 万美元的罚款，此举可能会影响棉花价格。【原文：Crop trader Olam Group Ltd. will pay a $3.3 million fine for delayed reporting of cotton sales to the US Department of Agriculture and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, a move that could have impacted cotton prices.】

item.title: 让梅根-埃里森的视频游戏部门崩溃的权力斗争
item.description:
高管之间的冲突导致安纳普尔那互动公司（Annapurna Interactive）的所有员工辞职，使得这位技术女继承人急于挽救其公司的视频游戏雄心

。【原文：

A clash between executives prompted all of the employees of Annapurna Interactive to quit, leaving the technology heiress scrambling to save her company’s video-game ambitions

】

item.title: 埃利奥特关联公司以 72.8 亿美元的出价赢得 Citgo 拍卖会
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司在 Citgo 石油公司母公司的拍卖中以 72.8 亿美元的出价成为领先竞标者，从而得以收购这家曾是委内瑞拉最大外国资产的炼油企业。【原文：An Elliott Investment Management affiliate emerged as the leading bidder in an auction for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent company with a bid for $7.28 billion, allowing it to acquire an oil refiner that was once Venezuela’s largest foreign asset.】

item.title: 中国敦促本土企业远离英伟达芯片
item.description: 中国政府正在加大对中国公司的施压力度，要求它们购买本地生产的人工智能芯片，而不是英伟达公司的产品，这是中国努力扩大半导体产业和对抗美国制裁的一部分。【原文：Beijing is stepping up pressure on Chinese companies to buy locally produced artificial intelligence chips instead of Nvidia Corp. products, part of the nation’s effort to expand its semiconductor industry and counter US sanctions.】

item.title: 中国和天气刺激农作物期货反弹，本周有望走强
item.description: 大豆期货创下一年多来的最大单周涨幅，主要进口国中国的经济刺激政策和主要产区的恶劣天气推动了谷物市场的广泛反弹。【原文：Soybean futures headed for the biggest weekly gain in more than a year amid a broader grains rally driven by economic stimulus in top importer China and adverse weather in major growing regions.】

item.title: 美国指控英国男子黑客攻击高管邮件进行非法交易
item.description: 一名英国男子被美国检察官指控入侵公司高管的电子邮件账户，以获取机密的盈利信息。【原文：A British man was charged by US prosecutors with hacking corporate executives’ email accounts to obtain confidential earnings information.】

item.title: 巴拿马认为出口库存的第一量子铜矿是可行的
item.description: 巴拿马财政部长表示，他认为第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）没有充分理由不出口其在该国已关闭矿山中储存的大量铜矿。【原文：Panama’s finance chief said he sees no good reason why First Quantum Minerals Ltd. shouldn’t export the large volume of copper stockpiled at its shuttered mine in the country.】

item.title: 花旗集团希望通过阿波罗交易成为一站式债务商店
item.description: 花旗集团债务资本市场全球主管理查德-佐格布（Richard Zogheb）表示，花旗集团和阿波罗全球管理公司 "不可能复制的关系 "促成了这一具有里程碑意义的私人信贷合作。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc.’s “impossible to replicate relationship” is what brought the landmark private credit partnership to fruition, said Richard Zogheb, the bank’s global head of debt capital markets.】
